Name: Look for the Silver Lining
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. Add ice-cream and FROSTED DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into chilled glass.
Review: Tangy citrus smoothed with cream, flavoured with vanilla and laced with rum notes.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Loreta Toska at Theory Bar & More in Athens, Greece. Loreta says, " In life, it is easy to get discouraged and let negativity overcome you... but if you do everything you can, work your hardest and stay positive, you have a shot at a silver lining. Look out for the Silver Lining! "
Nutrition: One serving of Look for the Silver Lining contains 242 calories
